entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
